content:
A great decision to cut down on coffee and explore the world of tea!

Of course, I'd be happy to help you calculate the cost per tea bag.

Let's do the math:

You got a pack of 20 tea bags for $5.

To find the cost per tea bag, you can divide the total cost ($5) by the number of tea bags (20):

$5 ÷ 20 = $0.25

So, each tea bag costs $0.25.

Enjoy your Earl Grey tea, and happy sipping!
